page.title: 07A TYPICAL FRIDAY
page.content: until the whistle goes and then we go in classes. When we get into our classrooms we all line up for assembly but people in the orchestra go first so they can get their music ready. On Friday we have a Friday guest. After assembly we come back to our classroom.The sort of work we normally do is maths and english and reading.At twenty to eleven we go out for our morning play time and we can eat fruit or crisps.When the whistle goes we all go in and carry on with our work. When twelve o'clock comes the people who have hot lunches go up to the hall and then at twenty to one the people who have packed lunches go into the hall to have their lunch. At half past two we go out for our afternoon play time. After playtime we come into the classroom and we often have a story then after that we go home.
